trial_T20190911_082932_280904.0: wash a spoon and put it away in the drawer . <<goal>> turn around and then go left into the kitchen . go straight back to the stove , but look to the counter on the right . pick up the spoon from the front of the counter . take the spoon and turn around to locate the sink . place the spoon in the sink , turn the water on and then off . take the spoon out of the sink . while holding the spoon , turn to the right and open the top white drawer . place the spoon inside the drawer and close it . <<stop>>
trial_T20190911_082932_280904.1: put the clean spoon in the drawer <<goal>> turn around to your left then cross the room , head to the right side of the counter pick up the spoon on the counter turn to your right then walk towards the sink put the spoon in the sink then rinse it turn to your right facing the drawer open the drawer put the spoon inside then close the drawer <<stop>>
trial_T20190911_082932_280904.2: place a clean spoon inside the drawer to the right of the sink . <<goal>> turn around and walk to the counter on the other side of the two black stools . pick up the spoon from the counter . turn around and walk to the sink . rinse the spoon in the sink and pick up the clean spoon . turn right to face the drawer to the right of the sink . place the clean spoon in the drawer to the right of the sink and then close it . <<stop>>
trial_T20190911_082932_280904.3: put a clean spoon in a drawer . <<goal>> turn around and cross the room to face the counter where the spoon is . pick the spoon up from the counter . turn around and stand in front of the sink . put the spoon in the sink , turn the water on and then turn the water off and then pick up the spoon . turn to the right . open the drawer and put the spoon in and then shut the drawer . <<stop>>
trial_T20190911_082932_280904.4: put the clean spoon on the cabinet drawer <<goal>> turn around to your right , then head to the counter beside the stove and turn to your right pick up the spoon on the counter top turn around to your right and head to the sink put the spoon on the sink , rinse it then pick it up turn to your left and face the stove pull the cabinet drawer then put in the spoon in and close the drawer <<stop>>
trial_T20190911_082932_280904.5: washing the dirty spoon <<goal>> walk in to the kitchen go to the counter grab the spoon that is on the counter take the dirty spoon to the kitchen sink place the spoon in the sink turn on the water and wash the spoon and put it away <<stop>>

trial_T20190907_203056_124573.0: put the warm piece of bread on the table . <<goal>> turn around , walk to the round table . pick up the knife next to the coffee pot . step closer to the table . cut the bread on the table . take a step to the right . put the knife on the table to the right of the bread . take a step to the left . pick up a piece of the bread . turn right , walk to the microwave . put the bread in the microwave for a few seconds , take the bread back out of the microwave . turn around , walk back to the table . put the bread next to the tomato on the table . <<stop>>
trial_T20190907_203056_124573.1: slice , heat and place a piece of bread on a kitchen table <<goal>> turn around and face the wooden table pick up the knife off of the table move slightly to your left and face the table again slice the loaf of bread move slightly to your right and face the table again put the knife down on the table move slightly to your left and face the table again pick up a slice of bread turn all the way to the right and face the microwave put the bread in the microwave and cook it for a few seconds turn all the way around and face back the to the table put down the bread on to the table <<stop>>
trial_T20190907_203056_124573.2: place a microwaved slice of bread on the wooden table <<goal>> turn around and walk to the loaf of bread on the table . pick up the yellow knife closest to the coffee machine . walk to the bread on the table . cut up the loaf of bread on the table . walk one step to the right and face the table . place the knife to the right of the loaf of bread on the table . walk to the cut up loaf of bread on the table . pick up a slice of bread from the table . turn right and walk to the microwave . microwave the slice of bread and then pick up the slice of bread from the microwave . turn around and walk to the wooden table . place the slice of bread to the right of the knife on the table . <<stop>>
